parameters.query:
SELECT * FROM leads 
WHERE 
  (last_scored_at IS NULL OR last_scored_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours')
  AND status NOT IN ('converted', 'lost', 'disqualified')
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 50;

parameters.jsCode:
// Prepare lead data for scoring
const input = $input.item.json;

// Handle both webhook (single lead) and batch (from DB)
const lead = {
  id: input.id || input.lead_id,
  source_id: input.source_id,
  name: input.name || input.contact_name,
  email: input.email,
  phone: input.phone,
  source: input.source || input.lead_source,
  location_hints: input.location_hints || input.location,
  postcode: input.postcode || input.postal_code,
  area: input.area,
  property_type: input.property_type,
  project_types: Array.isArray(input.project_types) 
    ? input.project_types 
    : (typeof input.project_types === 'string' 
      ? JSON.parse(input.project_types || '[]') 
      : []),
  project_complexity: input.project_complexity || input.complexity,
  budget_indicator: input.budget_indicator || input.budget,
  budget_range: input.budget_range,
  urgency: input.urgency || input.timeline,
  timeline: input.timeline,
  raw_data: input.raw_data
};

return { json: lead };
